title: Why is AWS more economical than traditional data centers for applications with varying compute workloads?
answer_1: A) Amazon EC2 costs are billed on a monthly basis.
answer_2: B) Users retain full administrative access to their Amazon EC2 instances.
answer_3: C) Amazon EC2 instances can be launched on demand when needed.
answer_4: D) Users can permanently run enough instances to handle peak workloads.
right_answer: C  The ability to launch instances on demand when needed allows users to launch and terminate instances in response to a varying workload. This is a more economical practice than purchasing enough on-premises servers to handle the peak load.
correct: C) Amazon EC2 instances can be launched on demand when needed.
